ygData.subject: Re: OOC r/l musical bards?
ygData.msgSnippet: I am a professional musician - I play trombone in a Jump Blues (aka Swing ) Band The Vanguard Aces . (We originally were called The Big Swing but a year
ygData.messageBody:
I am a professional musician - I play trombone in a Jump Blues (aka "Swing")
Band "The Vanguard Aces". (We originally were called "The Big Swing" but a
year ago split from our manager who owned the name) We mostly play in the
Chicago area - but do some touring - last fall we spent four weeks in
Europe. Check us out at http://www.vanguardaces.com

I've played just about every style of music that a trombone can play on
(except ska)... Before the Jump Blues band I spent two years in a
Salsa-Merengue band and also have done some reggae...

Slyde of Xegony
Level 18


----- Original Message -----
From: James Schuldes <jgs@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, June 29, 1999 3:21 PM
Subject: [eqbards] OOC r/l musical bards?


> From: James Schuldes <jgs@...>
>
> So we are all real good online Bards and have excellent musical abilities
to
> the point of powerful magic, etc. But what about in /ooc real life?
Anyone
> have any talent or interest?
>
